text:
Makefiles and some others in the connectors directory seem to have extra blank
lines between real lines and a "make" run just fails.  I tried to fix some
problems but I could not complete it due to my time constraint.

I must say that this is really for the beta 3 version.  I remember I could build
in beta 1.  Can I try a nightly build instead?
creator: Kaz.Sasayama@HyperLinuxJP.com

text:
The WebApp connector was moved into the jakarta-tomcat-connectors 
CVS tree, and what's currently in the CVS works for me.
creator: pier@betaversion.org
